to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: Regarding the solution of this computer issue
body:
And your website either maps to the wrong ip, doesn't have port 80 open or 
your isp is blocking incoming http requests. I get a connection timed out 
after 2 minutes; stating your site is unreachable with or without the www; 
both addresses map to the same a record.
Regards, Kerry.
